author: Stefan Gates
method: Pour the cream into a small saucepan. Add the rosemary sprigs and leave to infuse in the cold cream for as long as possible. Remove the rosemary then gently heat the cream until hot, but not boiling. Add the grated chocolate and stir quickly until melted. Pour into espresso cups and refrigerate until set. Decorate with a small sprig of rosemary and serve.
ingredients: 284ml/10fl oz tub of double cream,  3 sprigs of rosemary, plus extra to decorate,  100g/3Â½oz dark chocolate (minimum 70 per cent cocoa solids), grated
